name: Levagas
description:
Your name is Loretta, and you are on a Laboured quest to Locate the Lavish, Lush treasure. You must ROAM the Land to find it!

Across this landscape there are Lawless, Loud lunatics you must defeat. Use a weapon of similar colour to exploit their FLAWS and kill them.

Created for the third SAE Make a Thing Game Jam 2016
